abilities.name: Lucent Beam
abilities.description: Calls down a concentrated beam of lunar energy to damage and briefly stun a target.
abilities.notes: Each cast during Eclipse counts as one beam.

abilities.name: Lunar Orbit
abilities.description: Luna summons orbiting glaives that instantly attack nearby enemies.
abilities.notes: Glaives orbit around Luna and attack the nearest enemy automatically.

abilities.name: Moon Glaives
abilities.description: Luna's glaive attacks bounce to hit nearby enemies. Each bounce deals diminishing damage.
abilities.notes: Damage is reduced with each bounce.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Calls down multiple Lucent Beams upon random enemy units in the area. Creates a night-time effect for the duration.
abilities.notes: Turns day into night for 10 seconds. Each enemy can be hit a maximum of 5 times.

innate_abilities.name: Lunar Blessing
innate_abilities.description: Luna and nearby allies gain bonus damage. The aura is global during nighttime.
innate_abilities.notes: Bonus damage scales with Luna's level. The aura becomes global during nighttime.
